mapper.select: SELECT flight_id AS flightId, departure_airport AS departureAirport, arrival_airport AS arrivalAirport, departure_time AS departureTime, arrival_time AS arrivalTime, flight_number AS flightNumber FROM flight WHERE flight_id = #{flightId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation ( reservation_id, user_id, reserved_at, status, passenger_count, trip_type, expired_at ) VALUES ( #{reservationId}, #{userId}, #{reservedAt}, #{status}, #{passengerCount}, #{tripType}, #{expiredAt} )

INSERT INTO reservation_segment ( reservation_segment_id, flight_id, reservation_id, segment_order, snap_departure_airport, snap_arrival_airport, snap_departure_time, snap_arrival_time, snap_flight_number, snap_cabin_class_code, snap_price ) VALUES ( #{reservationSegmentId}, #{flightId}, #{reservationId}, #{segmentOrder}, #{snapDepartureAirport}, #{snapArrivalAirport}, #{snapDepartureTime}, #{snapArrivalTime}, #{snapFlightNumber}, #{snapCabinClassCode}, #{snapPrice} )
mapper.select: SELECT flight_info_id AS flightInfoId, flight_id AS flightId, first_class_seat AS firstClassSeat, business_class_seat AS businessClassSeat, economy_class_seat AS economyClassSeat FROM flight_info WHERE flight_id = #{flightId} FOR UPDATE
